title: 10/19: Mailbag (Recorded Fri.) (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
First the news! We discuss what to expect from Latavius Murray and update you on Patrick Mahomes and Ben tells you why Allen Lazard has potential. Then we've got your Apple Podcasts questions (12:14), Fantasy Regulators (23:00), your trade questions via email (31:00) and Start or Sit questions (43:00) for Fantasy Football Week 7.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Answering your questions and getting your lineups set, plus grading trades ahead of Week 7!
